about.title: About TibiaCores
about.subtitle: Your companion for managing creatures and characters in the world of Tibia

whatIs.title: What is TibiaCores?
whatIs.description: TibiaCores is a powerful tool designed to help you organize and manage your characters' soul cores progression. Whether you're looking to unlock 200 animus masteries or all of them, TibiaCores makes it easy to keep track of your collection.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: TibiaCores is an open-source project, and we welcome contributions from the community. Whether you're a developer, designer, or just have ideas to share, you can help make TibiaCores better:

list.bugs: Submit bug reports or feature requests

donation.title: Donation
donation.description: Your donations help TibiaCores grow and improve, allowing us to add new features, maintain the servers, and provide a better experience for all users. If you'd like to support our development, you can send in-game donations to:

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you! You can:
